alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 3:30AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Cattaraugus County through 415 AM EDT... At 329 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Ashford Hollow, or 11 miles northwest of Salamanca, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ashford, Arcade, Franklinville, Ashford Hollow, Yorkshire, New Albion, Napoli, Little Valley, Delevan, East Otto, Cattaraugus, Otto, Lyndon, Ellicottville, Lime Lake-Machias, Farmersville Station, Cattaraugus County Landfill, West Valley and Sandusky. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
